problem.markdown:
>>All of the following are true about synthetic (commercial) fertilizer EXCEPT:<< () it is designed for easy application to crops () it is susceptible to runoff () it can target the specific needs of the crop (x) it adds organic matter to the soil () it is highly concentrated
[explanation] Synthetic fertilizer is manufactured from chemical compounds, and therefore does not add organic matter to the soil. [explanation]
problem.p: All of the following are true about synthetic (commercial) fertilizer EXCEPT:

choicegroup.label: All of the following are true about synthetic (commercial) fertilizer EXCEPT:
choicegroup.choice: it is designed for easy application to crops
it can target the specific needs of the crop
it adds organic matter to the soil

div.p: Synthetic fertilizer is manufactured from chemical compounds, and therefore does not add organic matter to the soil.
